short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows a new Marcus Aurelius quote every day

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replaces your new tab with a quote from Marcus Aurelius's Meditations that changes every day. You can also get a new quote manually by clicking the refresh button in the top right. If you pin the extension, you can click on it any time to see that quote. 

Thanks to classics.mit.edu/Antoninus/meditations.html for the free version of Meditations.

Source code: github.com/ronthekiehn/Daily-Aurelius
